data.title: How many times has Tad Martin been married?
data.meta_description:
Hey there, AMC fans! 
I’ve got a very interesting question for you. 
We all know Tad Martin is one of PV’s most beloved and most prominent residents. 
So does anyone know how many times has Tad been married?  :smiley:
data.text:
